attributes.action: Scrap “must show proof of double jabs to attend large crowd events etc” Sept 21
attributes.additional_details:
Jabs do not prevent catching or spreading of the virus! Negative tests should be the only proof needed.
Just because someone is double jabbed doesn’t mean they can’t catch and spread covid so this shouldn’t allow them special treatment.
attributes.background: Stand by decision to not segregate our communities by introducing covid passports for every day social activities/events

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/593122
